ComicInfo.Title: Bride of Frankenstein; Smelrose Place; Monster Football League; Celebrity Answering Machines...; Warning Labels for People; Cracked's Kid-Vid Clearance; Replacement Shows; Einstein's Other Theories of Relativity; The Saboteur Home Alone Home Protection System; Zit Happens!; Cracked Kiss 'n' Tales; Columbus's Disappointing Discoveries; Who Else Is Home Alone?; When Government Regulations Apply to the Wild Kingdom!; Early One Morning at the Bus Station; Gunforgiven; One Fine Day in the Andes
